job_details.Vacaturetitel: Software Engineer with Gen AI Expertise
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Our engineering team operates in independent tribes, ensuring flat hierarchies and scalability. Each tribe is self-sufficient with full ownership of its area. Developers enjoy a lot of freedom: they choose missions to work on, and after completing a mission, they return to the launchpad to recover and prepare for the next one.
   The technologies we use:
   Front End - React.js and Next.js
   Back End - Node.js, Typescript with some PHP and Golang
   Gen AI - LLMs (SaaS and self-hosted)
   Other - MySQL, CouchDB, Redis, ElasticSearch, RabbitMQ and Kafka

   Your new adventure:
     * Work independently in a team and deliver high-quality code in a timely manner
     * Ensure that our AI platform and features are fast, reliable, and scale effectively as we continue to grow and enhance the AI user experience for all customers
     * Utilize techniques such as prompt engineering, embeddings, and tool/function calling to develop innovative solutions with generative AI
     * Work closely with product designers to create intuitive interfaces for our in-app AI assistant, ensuring a great experience for our users
     * Collaborate with machine learning engineers to develop and implement advanced ML models that drive our AI-powered features
job_details.full_text:
Software Engineer with Gen AI Expertise

Our engineering team operates in independent tribes, ensuring flat hierarchies and scalability. Each tribe is self-sufficient with full ownership of its area. Developers enjoy a lot of freedom: they choose missions to work on, and after completing a mission, they return to the launchpad to recover and prepare for the next one.
   The technologies we use:
   Front End - React.js and Next.js
   Back End - Node.js, Typescript with some PHP and Golang
   Gen AI - LLMs (SaaS and self-hosted)
   Other - MySQL, CouchDB, Redis, ElasticSearch, RabbitMQ and Kafka

   Your new adventure:
     * Work independently in a team and deliver high-quality code in a timely manner
     * Ensure that our AI platform and features are fast, reliable, and scale effectively as we continue to grow and enhance the AI user experience for all customers
     * Utilize techniques such as prompt engineering, embeddings, and tool/function calling to develop innovative solutions with generative AI
     * Work closely with product designers to create intuitive interfaces for our in-app AI assistant, ensuring a great experience for our users
     * Collaborate with machine learning engineers to develop and implement advanced ML models that drive our AI-powered features

profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes working with LLMs, prompt engineering, embeddings, and tool/function calling to develop innovative solutions with generative AI. It also mentions building and enhancing the AI user experience and collaborating with ML engineers, aligning strongly with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer.

phrases: Work independently in a team and deliver high-quality code in a timely manner
Ensure that our AI platform and features are fast, reliable, and scale effectively
Work closely with product designers to create intuitive interfaces for our in-app AI assistant, ensuring a great experience for our users
job_tasks.justification: These phrases indicate the need to build, integrate, and deploy AI features into user-facing applications, including creating interfaces and ensuring the platform is scalable and reliable.

phrases: Utilize techniques such as prompt engineering, embeddings, and tool/function calling to develop innovative solutions with generative AI
Collaborate with machine learning engineers to develop and implement advanced ML models that drive our AI-powered features
job_tasks.justification: This task category directly covers the core activities of working with generative AI models, including prompt engineering, embeddings, fine-tuning (implied by 'develop innovative solutions'), and collaborating on ML model implementation.

phrases: Ensure that our AI platform and features are fast, reliable, and scale effectively as we continue to grow and enhance the AI user experience for all customers
job_tasks.justification: This phrase points to the operational aspects of maintaining and scaling AI platforms and features in production, which is a key component of MLOps.

phrases: Our engineering team operates in independent tribes, ensuring flat hierarchies and scalability. Each tribe is self-sufficient with full ownership of its area.
Developers enjoy a lot of freedom: they choose missions to work on, and after completing a mission, they return to the launchpad to recover and prepare for the next one.
job_tasks.justification: These phrases describe the team's operational structure and the autonomy given to developers, which implies an understanding of how to align with business goals and take ownership of their work within a self-sufficient tribe.

phrases: Each tribe is self-sufficient with full ownership of its area.
Developers enjoy a lot of freedom: they choose missions to work on
develop innovative solutions with generative AI
Work independently in a team and deliver high-quality code in a timely manner
Ensure that our AI platform and features are fast, reliable, and scale effectively
